message.body: Got the holiday card yesterday! Thank you! (And now I have your new address!)
You're welcome! :) ##### and I solidified plans to be in Wburg 12/15 for service and 12/16... Hope you are doing well!
When are you heading back up?
We are just down for the weekend... Blehh
If I went up on Sunday, would you have any time to visit?
That is an excellent question...likely not much time, we fly back that night...I am hoping to make it to ###### in the spring though!
I'll take it! Keep me posted on possible weekends!
